name: Mini Truck Driver Cargo Simulator
description:
Mini Truck Driver Cargo Simulator with exciting and challenging driving experience at different hill stations. Game offers truck parking and cargo delivery in multiple locations. You have a chance to drive different types of mini loader trucks in off-road mountain environment. Show your parking and driving skills in the tricky cargo delivery task. Drive fast and avoid being crashed to deliver cargo within give time slot. Climb through mountains in this realistic truck driving simulation game. 

Mini tuck driving games with hilly and steep paths is a real challenge for truck drivers. Sometimes transporter truck is carrying dangerous cargo like gasoline, gas cylinders and ammunition boxes so drive carefully and smoothly. Off-road driving is difficult but can handle by perfect driving skills. Load cargo and transport to different destination on hill stations. Drive mini truck with speed to deliver cargo within given time. 

Mini Truck Driver Cargo Simulator Game Features:
• 15 Challenging and time based Cargo Transport tasks
• 3 Exciting and realistic mini trucks
• Different type of cargo transportation
• Smooth controls and easy game-play
• Freely available for all androids
• Mountainous 3D Environment with Off-road terrains
• Multiple camera angle for mini truck driving

How to Play? 
Tap to start the game and control your mini truck with Steering and buttons. Use accelerator and brake to maintain speed. 

Mini Truck Driver Cargo Simulator is the newest inclusion in driving games that will provide entertainment and fun. Do not forget to rate and review for further updates.
